Uses of Package
nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet

  • Packages that use nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet 
    Package Description
    nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet
    Endpoints providing an HTTP-based API for access to transcripts, annotations, media, and functions that manipulate them.
    nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet.annotator
    Servlets related to annotator management.
    nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet.doc
    Provides CRUD operations for all files/directories under /doc/*.
    nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet.uttered
    Servlets for the uttered transcript correction client wep-app.
  • Classes in nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet used by nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet 
    Class Description
    LabbcatServlet
    Base class for other servlets.
    RequiredRole
    Annotation for a LabbcatServlet subclass which defines the user role required to make requests to the servlet.
    SerializeGraphs
    /api/serialize/graphs : Converts transcripts to specific formats.
    Store
    Endpoints starting /api/edit/store/… provide an HTTP-based API for access to GraphStore functions.
    StoreQuery
    Endpoints starting /api/store/… provide an HTTP-based API for access to GraphStoreQuery functions.
    TableServletBase
    Base class that handles generic database table management.
  • Classes in nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet used by nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet.annotator 
    Class Description
    LabbcatServlet
    Base class for other servlets.
    RequiredRole
    Annotation for a LabbcatServlet subclass which defines the user role required to make requests to the servlet.
  • Classes in nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet used by nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet.doc 
    Class Description
    LabbcatServlet
    Base class for other servlets.
  • Classes in nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet used by nzilbb.labbcat.server.servlet.uttered 
    Class Description
    LabbcatServlet
    Base class for other servlets.
    RequiredRole
    Annotation for a LabbcatServlet subclass which defines the user role required to make requests to the servlet.
